title: Gippsland: Down river
brief_description: Shows how the floods that bring disaster to man in the Gippsland area play a key area play a key role in the natural cycle of the plant and animal life to be found there. However in the remote swamps and wetlands of the area, the cycle is threatened by man’s activities further upstream.
